inclusion.criterion: Patients with an asymptomatic stenosis >80% (NASCET) with a documented progression of the degree of stenosis to >80% within 6 months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Very tight stenosis ≥90% at initial presentation with a >80% stenosis plus silent ipsilateral ischemia documented by CCT or MRI
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Ipsilateral >80% stenosis plus contralateral >80% stenosis or occlusion
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Neurologist's explicit consent to potentially perform CAS
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: months. The primary and secondary study endpoints are evaluated for an initial two year follow-up period after randomization.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Secondary follow-up will be performed for 1, 1.5, 3, 5 and 10 years post randomization.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Underlying disease other than atherosclerosis (inflammatory or autoimmune disease)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of CAD s/p CABG, EF 60% prior CVA (no residual deficits), HTN, HL, DMII, Moderate to Severe PVD and carotid bruits. He reports occasional dizziness, no prior syncope occasional HA, Denies CP/SOB. No sensory or motor defects.
